attributes.title: Worst app
attributes.review: I was told I would get chicken nuggets if I downloaded this app never got them also while I have had this app my chairs have been running away I thing Donald trump is behind this 😡😡😡

attributes.title: Pinkeye
attributes.review: This app kicked my mom who’s in a wheelchair down the stairs and then spit in my mouth and called me a fat pig . Before I got this app Corona Wasn’t real as soon as I downloaded it corona came into my house and she farted on my pillow and now I have pinkeye👁

attributes.title: not sure how this app is #1 in news
attributes.review: this app has a really ugly platform that is difficult to use. i also noticed several bugs while using it, it consistently closes out the second i open it-which doesn’t happen with any other apps i use. super disappointing, not sure how this app is rated #1 in news. genuinely curious about what that is based on.

attributes.title: This app is awful
attributes.review: This app will use your location and send people to you’re house. I would not recommend this app to ANY PERSON even if I hated them because this app is so bad

attributes.title: Its a bad app
attributes.review: There’s a lot of things I dislike about this app and I wont name them because they are my opinion but if you would like download the app and see for yourself

attributes.title: This app is trash
attributes.review: When I got this app, it started messing with my phone, and I had to keep getting it checked. The app is really just a scam that causes your phone to glitch.

attributes.title: stealing my data
attributes.review: i can only think of 1 explanation for my phone running this slow, this god forsaken app.  the day i downloaded it my phone started glitching and being super slow.  there’s only one reason it would be this slow. if my personal data such as passwords and social security was being taken off my phone.  it’s atrocious and should be banned.

attributes.title: DOESN’T EVEN WORK
attributes.review: I downloaded this app and it doesn’t even open!! Its crashes every single time!! Also it has SOOO many ads where I can’t even see the content!! -1/10!! Do not download this app

attributes.title: HORRIBLE APP!
attributes.review: i've never had such a bad experience with an app. it kept giving me notifications on this cheeto puff looking guy. this was a very traumatic situation because  it reminded me i'm  severely allergic to people who are the color orange with fake blonde toupees.
